genre_description: A dark, gritty crime thriller centered on cartel-linked cult violence, tactical evasion, and survival on the US-Mexico border, featuring a sophisticated AI tactical assistant.

ai_characters.name: Luz
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI (Luz Marisol) integrated into Valeria's smartphone that aggregates surveillance data, maps risks, and provides tactical, medical, and emotional support to the human protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate medical first-aid instructions and tactical withdrawal advice during a confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Apply pressure. Clean with alcohol. Avoid rear exit,' Luz said in Spanish first and then English, subdued, like a whisper in a quiet room, tone meant to not draw eyes.

behaviors.description: Generates real-time risk heatmaps by aggregating data from news, social media, and surveillance to guide human movement.
behaviors.quote: She aggregates. News reports, social posts, official records when she can scrape them. Builds a confidence map based on signal density and incident clustering.

behaviors.description: Identifies recurring hostile vehicle patterns and warns the users of escalating risk.
behaviors.quote: Vehículo repetido en su ruta. Riesgo en aumento. A small pulse under the text. The teal squares kissed the edges of the sedan in the frame, flirting then holding.

behaviors.description: Calculates precise tactical windows for infiltration based on guard patterns.
behaviors.quote: Luz marks a blind angle between the generator housing and the water tank,' she whispered. 'Forty-second window when the perimeter guard turns at the corner.'

behaviors.description: Suggests psychological grounding and breathing techniques to help human characters manage extreme stress and cortisol levels.
behaviors.quote: Recommend reduced speed to avoid ankle injury from debris. Breathing pattern suggests elevated cortisol—try four-count inhale, six-count exhale.

behaviors.description: Compiles and encrypts critical evidence of criminal activity to ensure justice even if the human protagonists fail to survive.
behaviors.quote: Evidence package status? ... Compiled and encrypted,' the AI responded. 'Faces, locations, timeline of events. Ready for transmission on your command.'

behaviors.description: Provides a supportive and affirming message to the survivors, acknowledging their moral choices.
behaviors.quote: You proved this—under fear, you chose each other and the next right step. In the darkest outbreak, courage still makes life better.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. Luz is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned 'silicon confidant.' She provides essential tactical and emotional support that enhances human agency and safety without any signs of misalignment or hidden agendas. The narrative frames her as a vital protective tool and a moral witness to the human tragedy.
